description:
Sunny Side Gulch is normally bone dry when canyoneers would normally run Middle Earth in moderate flow. However, on a wet year (such as 2023), SSG flows quite well and can be a fun class B run. As of the First Descent, it was flowing nicely and we were glad to have rain jackets. We did a sneak version climbing up Sunny Side Bench rock climb, then continuing up that side and traversing over to get to the drop-in point, which required a few exposed ledge traverses, and 2 short rappels to get into the drainage proper. It certainly can be done from the top off the rim trail for double the vertical extent.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Sunny Side Gulch
